CustomOptOut.ShowEditorDescription: Turn on this option to show the "custom CSS" code in a simple CSS editor.
CustomOptOut.EditorThemeDescription: Choose a theme for the editor.
CustomOptOut.DefaultCssStylesDescription: These CSS styles will be used if no page is selected.
CustomOptOut.DefaultCssFileDescription: This CSS file will be used if no page is selected.
CustomOptOut.EnableJavascriptInjectionDescription: Turn on this option to show fields to enter JavaScript in.
